classes.description: Details about various magic tricks and illusions.

properties.name: trickName
properties.description: Name of the magic trick or illusion.

properties.name: description
properties.description: A brief description of the trick and how it's performed.

properties.name: difficultyLevel
properties.description: Difficulty level of the trick, e.g., beginner, intermediate, expert.

properties.name: performer
properties.description: Famous magician known for performing this trick.

properties.name: biography
properties.description: Brief biography or background of the magician.
